isRandomizationSeedEnabled

public boolean isRandomizationSeedEnabled()
If true, random number generator will be initialized with a randomizationSeed. If false random number generator will be initialized using 'current' time.

Returns:
true when randomization seed is enabled.
See Also:
getRandomizationSeed()

getTolerance

public double getTolerance()
Return tolerance used to determine cluster centroid distance. This tolerance is used to determine if a centroid changed location between iterations.

Returns:
cluster centroid location tolerance.

setTolerance

public void setTolerance(float tolerance)

public boolean isClusterAnimationEnabled()
Return true if when an animation illustrating cluster optimization is enabled.

Returns:
true when cluster animation is enabled.
